Home.TypicalHome: I am a full stack developer

AboutMe.Text: Welcome to my portfolio! My name is Gonzalo Martins, and I'm 21 years old. I have one year of experience as a developer, during which I held the position of full-stack developer. In terms of education, I completed a bootcamp called Henry and then continued my journey as a self-taught developer. I consider myself a committed individual with a passion for taking on new challenges.

Proyects.Memotest: The famous memory game 'memotest' created with js and css
Proyects.Nasa: An application that displays a photo accompanied by a description selected by NASA. Daily, NASA updates this API to refresh the information.
Proyects.Clima: An application that displays the weather in any city around the world.
Proyects.Todo: An application that you can use as a to-do list. In this app, you can create tasks, edit them, mark them as completed, and delete them.
Proyects.Gestor: Application for a laundry service that manages orders, prices, and financial balances.
